response_en: Please. You know I only come here because of Auntie's chocolate cake.
reaction_en: That's it! Give me your sweet potatoes, you don't deserve them!

response_en: That's true! By the way, I saw the recipe laying around. You should be careful; if I can make my own, who knows if I'll ever come back here...
reaction_en: Don't worry, that recipe you saw was a decoy.

response_en: They're the only thing that give me enough strength to withstand your sense of humour!
reaction_en: Better have another serving then, because I'm just getting started!
